title: ok uhhhhhhhh
body: is Lucian more op then last season?

replies.body: Her Ult with Crit hurts like fuck, but using her as an AP works better since you can hammer the enemy with your E all day long and annoy the fuck out of them.
Yes but as annoying as you are as an AP, AD is still the better version

He's not in a bad spot, but there are other marksman that are so much better (he is at a 50.6% win rate overall, and for plat and above he is at a 51.2% win rate (being the 9th marksman) so yeah, better marksman's are available to you, and Lucian tends to fall off late game hitting a 50% win rate by time it's 30 minutes (meaning you have to have snowballed in the lane and won already.)
actually quite weak atm compared to previous states

since when did i change my mind?
He is weak atm compared to some previous states.
I feel like he has the best build path he's been able to have in ages with the new items. I don't know, I don't AD but it definitely feels like a lot of the items are perfect for him
He is pretty op since thunderlords is op and essence reaver is actually useful and his ult got a massive buff to its base stats and the masteries just straight out work for him.
